entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening then changing to rain overnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain or snow. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023
